description.value: A code from the SNOMED Clinical Terminology UK coding system that describes a type of device. Any code from the SNOMED CT UK 'Device Type' subset with subset original id 1361000000131; the corresponding SNOMED CT UK Refset fully specified name is 'Device type simple reference set (foundation metadata concept)' with Refset Id 999000401000000107.
